chart.title: Life expectancy in males and females
chart.subtitle: The [period life expectancy](#dod:period-life-expectancy) at birth, in a given year.

Life expectancy - Sex: male - Age: 0 - V.titleLong: Life Expectancy,  males, age 0 - UN WPP
Life expectancy - Sex: male - Age: 0 - V.descriptionShort: Period life expectancy for male individuals who have reached age 0. Estimates are expressed as the expected age at death, not as years left to live.
Life expectancy - Sex: male - Age: 0 - V.citationShort: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Life expectancy - Sex: male - Age: 0 - V.citationLong: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Life Expectancy,  males, age 0 – UN WPP” [dataset]. United Nations, “World Population Prospects” [original data].

Life expectancy - Sex: female - Age: 0 -.titleLong: Life Expectancy,  females, age 0 - UN WPP
Life expectancy - Sex: female - Age: 0 -.descriptionShort: Period life expectancy for female individuals who have reached age 0. Estimates are expressed as the expected age at death, not as years left to live.
Life expectancy - Sex: female - Age: 0 -.citationShort: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data
Life expectancy - Sex: female - Age: 0 -.citationLong: UN, World Population Prospects (2024) – processed by Our World in Data. “Life Expectancy,  females, age 0 – UN WPP” [dataset]. United Nations, “World Population Prospects” [original data].
